p: The protease activity was assessed by addition of 200 μL of casein solution casein (1%) to 100 μL of enzyme and 100 μL universal buffer (pH 7). Then, the obtained mixture was incubated at 37 °C for 60 min [ 22]. The mixture was centrifuged at 8000× g within 15 min and the absorbance was read at 440 nm.
